mapper.sql: id, stock_code, end_date, holder_name, holder_code, ranking, hold_count, hold_rate, hold_float_rate, gmt_create

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into shareholder
stock_code,
end_date,
holder_name,
holder_code,
ranking,

mapper.update:
update shareholder
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
stock_code = #{record.stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_date = #{record.endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
holder_name = #{record.holderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
holder_code = #{record.holderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ranking = #{record.ranking,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hold_count = #{record.holdCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
hold_rate = #{record.holdRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
hold_float_rate = #{record.holdFloatRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gmt_create = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update shareholder set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stock_code = #{record.stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_date = #{record.endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, holder_name = #{record.holderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, holder_code = #{record.holderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ranking = #{record.ranking,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hold_count = #{record.holdCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, hold_rate = #{record.holdRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, hold_float_rate = #{record.holdFloatRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gmt_create = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update shareholder
stock_code = #{stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
holder_name = #{holderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
holder_code = #{holderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ranking = #{ranking,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hold_count = #{holdCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
hold_rate = #{holdRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
hold_float_rate = #{holdFloatRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update shareholder set stock_code = #{stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, holder_name = #{holderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, holder_code = #{holderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ranking = #{ranking,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hold_count = #{holdCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, hold_rate = #{holdRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, hold_float_rate = #{holdFloatRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select sum(t.hold_float_rate) from (select * from shareholder where stock_code=#{symbol} order by end_date desc limit 10) as t;
